meanings.sent1: The logographic symbols were easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The logographic system used in the ancient language was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The logographic signs seemed to dance across the page.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked in a logographic way, connecting images effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The logographic nature of the writing made it memorable and unique.
